SA11n1119:4: tatreti saddharmaparigrahe vartamānasyātmabhāvarakṣā cintyate yathā parānna nāśayet |
SA11n1119:17: pratīcchakā na bhetsyanti citrāmṛkṣyanti te kathām |peyālaṃ ||
SA11n1119:19: kāruṇyaṃ ca kariṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam ||
SA11n1119:23: dūrato maitrameṣyāmo mā no ruṣyeta eva hi ||
SA11n1119:34: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya sattvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu |
SA11n1119:36: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca |
SA11n1119:41: ete dharmā na cāsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathaṃcana ||
SA11n1119:42: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ |
SA11n1119:43: bhūtāṃ codana saṃśrutya idaṃ sūtraṃ pratikṣipan ||
SA11n1119:45: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam ||
SA11n1119:50: tasmin kāle vayaṃ kaṣṭe tyaktvā kāyaṃ sajīvitam |
SA11n1119:55: ye cāpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam |
SA11n1119:63: na tāḥ saṃmodayejjātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitum |
SA11n1119:69: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍitaḥ |
SA11n1119:70: na caikaḥ praviśettatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhavet ||iti ||
SA11n1119:73: atraivāha- punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate,
SA11n1119:74: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya viheṭhanamupasaṃharanti,
SA11n1119:87: punaraparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaśchandiko bhaviṣyati imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ yāvadvācayituṃ dharmaśravaṇikaśca kilāsī bhaviṣyati |
SA11n1119:89: dharmabhāṇakaśca deśāntaraṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyanti dhārmaśravaṇikāśca neti neyam |
SA11n1119:90: evaṃ dharmabhāṇako maheccho bhaviṣyati dhāmarśravaṇiko'lpeccha iti neyam |
SA11n1119:97: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattva āraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyāsanābhirato'lpecchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto'saṃsṛṣṭo gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ |
SA11n1119:100: na sattvaparipākāya na ca dharmaśravaṇe vā dharma[sāṃ] kathye vā arthaviniścayakathāyāṃ vā vartamānāyāṃ saṃkramitavyaṃ manyate |
SA11n1119:103: tasyāraṇyavāsena caikārāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti |
SA11n1119:110: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate,
SA11n1119:112: ye hyenaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārātsaddharmaparigrahādvicchandya praviveke niyojayanti |
SA11n1119:115: yasmīśca samaye bodhisattvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne'bhyudgacchettasmin samaye taṃ bodhisattvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti |
SA11n1119:119: eva cainaṃ vadanti-ārabdhavīryasya bodhisattvasya bodhirna kusīdasya |
SA11n1119:122: tatra bhagavān bodhisattvo'tyārabdhena vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punaretadvidyate yannirvāṇaphalaṃ prāpnuyāt |
SA11n1119:123: ayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakeṇa daśamo mārāṅkuśaḥ ||
SA11n1119:124: ye'pi tato'nye bodhisattvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārāṅkuśāvidvāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
SA11n1119:128: yaduta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍaiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvadekādaśo mārāṅkuśa itiḥ ||
SA11n1119:129: yena caivaṃ sāṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedātsarvathā bodhisattvabhāva eva bhavati,
SA11n1119:132: tathā cārabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ sa janayati,
SA11n1119:135: kīdṛśaṃ tadvīrya yena khedo na bhavati?
SA11n1119:136: yadidamalpabalasya gurukarmārambho'tivelāyāṃ vā aparipakkādhimuktervā duṣkarakarmārambhastadyathā svamāṃsadānādiḥ |
SA11n1119:139: anyathā hi teṣāmeva sattvānāṃ bodhisattvakhedena bodhicittabījanāśānmahataḥ phalarāśernāśaḥ syāt ||
SA11n1119:143: tasmādevaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohātsvārthaghātibhyaḥ piśitāśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaścātmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ ||
SA11n1119:149: asya visarjanaṃ ratnameghasūtre kathitam-kathaṃ ca kulaputra atra bodhisattvo mārakarmaparihāropāyakuśalo bhavati?
SA11n1119:152: ye cānye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgāntarāyikāstān sarveṇa sarva parivarjayati |
SA11n1119:161: tena ca kulaputra etāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānāmantike duṣṭacittamutpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nāvamanyanācittamutpādayitavyam |
SA11n1119:163: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā-dhātuśaḥ sattvāḥ kāmādidhātumāstravanti jāyante saṃsyandante,
SA11n1119:168: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisattvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati |
SA11n1119:174: asya vivarjanamatroktam-caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisattvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittamāmukhībhavati |
SA11n1119:177: yaduta jīvitahetorapi saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate |
SA11n1119:178: antaśo hāsyaprekṣikayāpi adhyāśayena ca sarvasattvānāmantike tiṣṭhatyapagatamāyāśāṭhayatayā |
SA11n1119:185: na jātu dharmadānasya antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
SA11n1119:189: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu |
SA11n1119:193: samādāyeti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati ||
SA11n1119:199: idameva pātrabodhicittasya sphuṭataramasaṃpramoṣakāraṇaṃ yattatraiva ratnakūṭe'bhihitam-sarveryāpatheṣu bodhicittaparikarmaṇatayā bodhicittapūrvagamatayā ceti ||
SA11n1119:206: etadvarjanaṃ ca ratnameghe dṛṣṭam -iha bodhisattvo naivaṃ cittamutpādayatiduṣprāpā bodhirmanuṣyabhūtena satā |
SA11n1119:207: idaṃ ca me vīrya parīttaṃ ca |
SA11n1119:209: bodhiścādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn kalpān bahūni kalpaśatāni bahūni kalpasahastrāṇi samudānetavyā |
SA11n1119:211: kiṃ tarhi bodhisattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-ye'pi te'bhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
SA11n1119:217: ahamapi tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasattvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsya iti ||
SA11n1119:218: punaraparo'nartho ratnakūṭe dṛṣṭaḥ-aparipāciteṣu sattveṣu viśvāso bodhisattvasya skhalitam,
SA11n1119:222: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisattvasya skhalitamiti ||
SA11n1119:225: yasyadhimukti na vidyati buddhe dharmagaṇe ca na tasyadhimuktiḥ |
SA11n1119:227: sa itaścyuto manujeṣu karmavaśādabudho hi vimūḍhaḥ |
SA11n1119:228: narakeṣvatha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duḥkham || iti ||
SA11n1119:229: asya visarjanaṃ ratnakūṭe'bhihitaṃ dṛṣṭam-yeṣu cāsya gambhīreṣu buddhirnāvahagāhate,
SA11n1119:230: tatra tathāgata eva sākṣīti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati |
SA11n1119:232: anantā buddhabodhirnānādhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ sattveṣu dharmadeśanā pravartata iti ||
SA11n1119:239: tatra ye bhikṣava āraṇyakāḥ prāntaśayyāsanikāsteṣāṃ vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarva na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyam |
SA11n1119:240: yadi punarāraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāta,
SA11n1119:242: anyataro vā bhikṣuradhyeṣyo na punaḥ sa āraṇyako bhikṣurutpīḍayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1119:244: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇa praṇītabhojaneṣu saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1119:248: yasmiśca pradeśe sa yogācārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati,
SA11n1119:264: kiyatparīttamapi kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ na svamatena,
SA11n1119:267: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalpaṃ bhavetsāṃghikaśca lābha utsado bhavettena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃghamekamānasaṃ kṛtvā sāṃghikalābhāccāturdiśasāṃghikakāryaṃ kartavyam |
SA11n1119:268: evaṃ stūpe'pi pralugne'yameva vidhirdāyakān dānapatīn vā samādāpya pratisaṃskartavya ityājñā |
SA11n1119:269: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyadbahurapi staupiko lābho bhavet,
SA11n1119:270: sa vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa na saṃghe na cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ |
SA11n1119:272: yā staupikā antaśa ekadaśāpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulairniryātitā bhavati,
SA11n1119:274: kaḥ punarvādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā |
SA11n1119:277: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyam |
SA11n1119:278: na hi staupikasya kaścidargho nāpi stūpasya kenacidvaikalyam |
SA11n1119:279: yo hi kaścitkāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyānāmaiśvaryādājñaptiṃ dadāti,
SA11n1119:282: dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇām |
SA11n1119:291: tasya tatra jihvendriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahastrāṇi ādīptāni ayasmayāni nikhātāni bhavanti |
SA11n1119:292: yo hi kaścitkāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣurāgatāgataṃ sāṃdhikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃnidhiṃ karoti,
SA11n1119:297: tatra asya anye pretā bhojanaṃ gṛhītvā apadarśayanti |
SA11n1119:298: sa uddhasyamānastadbhojanamanimiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vetti,
SA11n1119:299: na ca varṣasahastreṇāpi tasya bhojanasya lābho bhavati |
SA11n1119:303: saṃgharakṣitāvadāne'pyanartha uktaḥ-yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ kuḍayākārāṃste bhikṣava āsan |
SA11n1119:306: yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ stambhākārāṃste bhikṣava āsan |
SA11n1119:313: yāṃstvaṃ sattvānadrākṣī rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārāṃste bhikṣava āsan |
SA11n1119:322: sa mātsaryopahatacittaḥ kathayati-kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakamiti?
SA11n1119:323: te vṛttā veleti nairāśyamāpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ |
SA11n1119:324: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ ||
SA11n1119:345: sa kathayati-jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakam |
SA11n1119:348: tathāpi tu yanmayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tatkṛtam |
SA11n1119:353: apyeva nāma etatkarma parikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchediti |
SA11n1119:361: yaṃ tvaṃ sattvamadrākṣīrmadhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇam,
SA11n1119:366: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati ||
